doc.title: Wishful Thinking
doc.plot: An imaginative little girl changes the mood and theme of her ordinary birthday party, when she makes a wish and blows out the candles of her cake. The CG animation, Wishful Thinking, is the third in an ongoing series of shorts that combine storytelling with advocacy to communicate healthy food choices to children (and their families) After collectively rejecting a varied selection of sweets set out before them, the seven tiny guests do more than just squeal with delight when the birthday girl's wish comes true.
